articles.title: Pence contradicts Trump on January 6, calling plan to decertify 2020 election 'un-American' - CNN
articles.description: Former Vice President Mike Pence rebuked former President Donald Trump on Thursday night on the question of overturning the results of the 2020 presidential election.
articles.content:

articles.title: ‘Peru Two’ drugs mule Michaella McCollum reveals she cried in cockroach-infested jail - The Mirror
articles.description: McCollum told a new BBC documentary how she struggled to cope in the Peru jail where she spent three years after trying to smuggle cocaine out of the South American country
articles.content:

articles.title: Singapore may get non-mRNA Novavax Covid-19 vaccine before year-end - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/ANN): Singapore has signed advanced purchase agreements with American biotechnology company Novavax to secure its protein-based Covid-19 vaccine, with supplies possibly arriving before the end of the year.

articles.title: This year's COVID-19 death total has already surpassed that of last year - Daily Mail
articles.description: The death toll of the COVID-19 pandemic in 2021 has already surpassed that of 2020 only half-way through the year. India and countries and South America have been hit hardest.
articles.content:
The global death toll of COVID-19 in 2021 has already surpassed the virus's total death toll from 2020.
